# <Action Title>

## Purpose
- One-sentence statement describing the desired outcome and why it matters.

## Context
- Links to SSOT entries, issues, diagrams, or dependent documents.

## Plan of Work
1. Step-by-step actions with owners and dependencies.
2. Risks or escalation triggers.

## Validation
- Commands to run and expected outputs.
- Rollback or mitigation steps if validation fails.

## Status
- [YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM UTC] Initial plan drafted.
- [YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM UTC] Updates recorded as work progresses.

## Follow-up
- Outstanding tasks, linked PRs, monitoring checks, or scheduled reviews.

- 2025-11-02: Template created.
